animation_color_battery_to_house: color of the animation between battery and house (default: empty)
animation_color_grid_to_battery: color of the animation between public grid and battery (default: empty)
animation_color_grid_to_house: color of the animation between public grid and house (default: empty)
animation_color_house_to_custom1: color of the animation between house and custom element 1 (default: empty)
animation_color_house_to_custom10: color of the animation between house and custom element 10 (default: empty)
animation_color_house_to_custom11: color of the animation between house and custom element 11 (default: empty)
animation_color_house_to_custom2: color of the animation between house and custom element 2 (default: empty)
animation_color_house_to_custom3: color of the animation between house and custom element 3 (default: empty)
animation_color_house_to_custom4: color of the animation between house and custom element 4 (default: empty)
animation_color_house_to_custom5: color of the animation between house and custom element 5 (default: empty)
animation_color_house_to_custom6: color of the animation between house and custom element 6 (default: empty)
animation_color_house_to_custom7: color of the animation between house and custom element 7 (default: empty)
animation_color_house_to_custom8: color of the animation between house and custom element 8 (default: empty)
animation_color_house_to_custom9: color of the animation between house and custom element 9 (default: empty)
animation_color_solar0_to_solar: Color of the animation between additional solar-production and solar-production (default: empty)
animation_color_solar1_to_solar: Color of the animation between second additional solar-production and solar-production (default: empty)
animation_color_solar_to_battery: color of the animation between solar production and battery (default: empty)
animation_color_solar_to_grid: color of the animation between solar production and public grid (default: empty)
animation_color_solar_to_house: color of the animation between solar production and house (default: empty)
animation_distance: Distance between the dots on the line
animation_dots: Number of animation dots on the line
animation_duration: Duration of the animation in ms (1 second are 1000ms)
animation_length: Length of each dot on the line
animation_linecap_butt: rectangular ends trimmed at the endpoints
animation_type_ease: fast till middle of the animation, slowing at the end
animation_type_ease-in-out: slowly transitioning, speeding up, and then slowing down again
animation_type_ease-out: starts quickly, slows down until end
animation_width: Width of each dot on the line
cb_battery_capacity: Show remaining time of charging/discharging (this only works, if you provide the percentage and capacity of your battery)
cb_battery_different: Activate, if you use different states for Battery charge and discharge
cb_battery_reverse: Use negative for charging <u>and</u> positive for discharging
cb_grid_all_positive: Use positive for consumption <u>and</u> positive for public grid feed in
cb_grid_different: Activate, if you use different states for public grid feeding and consumption
cb_grid_reverse: Use positive for consumption <u>and</u> negative for public grid feed in
cb_percent_shadow: Show shadow around the percent values
color_animation: color of the animation on the lines (default: #ffce4a)
color_battery: Outline color of the element around the battery (default: #a1d343)
color_battery_percent: color of the %-text inside the element of the battery (default: #a1d343)
color_battery_remain: color of the remaining time label of the battery (default: #000000)
color_battery_text: color of the value inside the element of the battery (default: #a1d343)
color_battery_to_house: color of the line between battery and house (default: empty)
color_car: Outline color of the element around the car (default: #c5902e)
color_car_custom_percent: color of the %-text inside the element of the car (default: #f20e40)
color_car_percent: color of the %-text inside the element of the car (default: #c5902e)
color_car_plugged: color of the car icon if charger is connected (default: #a1d343)
color_car_text: color of the value inside the element of the car (default: #c5902e)
color_custom: Outline color around the custom element (default: #f20e40)
color_custom_text: color of the value inside the custom element (default: #f20e40)
color_grid: Outline color of the element around the public grid feed (default: #61687a)
color_grid_text: color of the value inside the element of the public grid feed-in (default: #61687a)
color_grid_to_battery: color of the line between public grid and battery (default: empty)
color_grid_to_house: color of the line between public grid and house (default: empty)
color_house: Outline color of the element around the consumption (default: #00b5dd)
color_house_text: color of the value inside the element of the consumption (default: #00b5dd)
color_house_to_custom1: color of the line between house and charging car / custom element 1 (default: empty)
color_house_to_custom10: color of the line between house and custom element 10 (default: empty)
color_house_to_custom11: color of the line between house and charging car / custom element 11 (default: empty)
color_house_to_custom2: color of the line between house and custom element 2 (default: empty)
color_house_to_custom3: color of the line between house and custom element 3 (default: empty)
color_house_to_custom4: color of the line between house and custom element 4 (default: empty)
color_house_to_custom5: color of the line between house and custom element 5 (default: empty)
color_house_to_custom6: color of the line between house and custom element 6 (default: empty)
color_house_to_custom7: color of the line between house and custom element 7 (default: empty)
color_house_to_custom8: color of the line between house and custom element 8 (default: empty)
color_house_to_custom9: color of the line between house and custom element 9 (default: empty)
color_no_prod: color of the value if value is below threshold (default: empty)
color_production: Outline color of the element around the solar production (default: #ffce4a)
color_production0: Outline color of the additional element around the solar production (default: #ffce4a)
color_production0_text: color of the value inside the additional element of the solar production (default: #ffce4a)
color_production1: Outline color of the second additional element around the solar production (default: #ffce4a)
color_production1_text: color of the value inside the second additional element of the solar production (default: #ffce4a)
color_production_text: color of the value inside the element of the solar production (default: #ffce4a)
color_solar0_to_solar: color of the line between additional solar-production and solar-production (default: empty)
color_solar1_to_solar: color of the line between second additional solar-production and solar-production (default: empty)
color_solar_to_battery: color of the line between solar production and battery (default: empty)
color_solar_to_grid: color of the line between solar production and public grid (default: empty)
color_solar_to_house: color of the line between solar production and house (default: empty)
debounce_percent: If using the automatic animation, the animation dots could flicker/jump, if the consuming is changing a lot. Define a percentage, to debounce the animation on the line. The higher the value, the more debounce.
disable_icons: disable all icons inside the layout
donate: If you like this adapter, please consider making a donation to support my work.
element_animation: swap text and values inside the element every x milliseconds
ex_alternate_desc: Alternate Data point for displaying inside the element
ex_automatic_animation: (if activated, the animation will calculate the speed depending on the consumption - higher consumption, higher speed - maximum speed is the duration of the animation)
ex_background_color: Background color (if empty, transparent is used)
ex_battery_capacity: capacity of your battery in watt-hours
ex_battery_charge:
Data point for charging your battery

(This is usually a negative and positive condition. If the state is different, please check the box and specify the other state on)
ex_battery_discharge: Data point for discharging your battery
ex_battery_dod: depth of discharge of your battery in percent
ex_battery_percent: data point of your battery charge-level in %
ex_car_battery: Data point of your car accu in %
ex_car_charge: Data point of your charger or wallbox
ex_car_plugged: Data point car charger plugged in
ex_consumption: Data point of your house consumption
ex_custom: Data point of your custom element
ex_custom_icon1:
How to get the Icon?
(Visit https://materialdesignicons.com and search for an icon.
ex_custom_icon2: Click the Icon and in the below row click '< / >', choose 'View SVG' and copy only the text inside d.
ex_custom_icon3: If you entered it correctly, it will replace the current question mark icon below.
ex_design: Change various designs of the energy flow
ex_element_distance: Distance between the elements on the horizontal axis
ex_element_label: color of the labeling inside the the element (default: #000000)
ex_element_shadow: color of the shadow around the element (default: rgba(0, 0, 0, .7))
ex_element_size: Thickness of the element outline (in px)
ex_fraction: If zero, the value will be rounded to the next possible integer.
ex_grid_consumption: Data point of your public grid consumption
ex_grid_feed:
Data point of your public grid feeder

(This is usually a negative and positive condition. If the state is different, please check the box and specify the other state on)
ex_house_netto: If activated, the value shown in the consumption element will be reduced by this
ex_icon_color: color of the icon inside the element (default: #000000)
ex_icons_shadow: color of the shadow around the icons (default: rgba(0, 0, 0, .7))
ex_offset: Here you can re-position the elements. Higher numbers move the elements more down. Lower or minus numbers move them up (Default: 0)
ex_offset_icon: offset of the icon inside the element
ex_offset_percent: offset of the percent value inside the element
ex_offset_remaining: offset of the battery remaining text next to the battery element
ex_offset_text: offset of the text inside the element
ex_offset_value: offset of the value inside the element
ex_opacity: Change the opacity of various elements, texts and values
ex_opacity_icon: opacity of the icon inside the element (Default: 70)
ex_opacity_percent: opacity of the percent value inside the element (Default: 100)
ex_opacity_remaining: opacity of the battery remaining text below the battery element  (Default: 70)
ex_opacity_text: opacity of the text inside the element (Default: 70)
ex_opacity_value: opacity of the value inside the element (Default: 100)
ex_percent_shadow: color of the shadow around the percent values (default: rgba(0, 0, 0, .7))
ex_production: Data point of your photovoltaic production
ex_production0: Data point of your additional photovoltaic production
ex_production1: Data point of your second additional photovoltaic production
ex_text_shadow: color of the shadow around the text (default: rgba(0, 0, 0, .7))
ex_threshold:
a threshold over or under which values are handled.
10 for values greater than 10 or -10 Watts / or 0.01 for values greater than 0.01 or -0.01 kW.
This value affects the color too.
ex_unit_swap: Unit (W or kW) for displaying for the alternate datapoints
ex_values_shadow: color of the shadow around the values (default: rgba(0, 0, 0, .7))
fill_elements: Fill elements depending on their prozentual value (color need to be defined in coloring section)
font-for-all: font-face for all elements - if URL specified on the right, define alias here (default: sans-serif)
font-src:
relative font url
Only (relative) paths from the same ip or address are allowed! (default: empty)
font_size_label: font-size of the description inside the element (in px)
font_size_percent: font-size of the percent unit inside the element (in px)
font_size_remaining: font-size of the remaining battery time (in px)
font_size_unit: font-size of the unit inside the element (in px)
font_size_unit_percent: font-size of the percent unit inside the element (in px)
font_size_value: font-size of the value inside the element (in px)
fraction: Number of places after the decimal point for all values
fraction_battery: Number of places after the decimal point for the %-text
grid feed in settings: Public grid feed-in and public grid consumption
house_netto: Subtract this value from the House consumption
label: labeling:
line_desc: Here you are able to modify each line and animation between the elements. Standard-color above will be overwritten!
line_visible: Show line only when animation is running (otherwise the line is always shown)
recalculate: Calculate values from W in kW
slim_design: Activate Slim-Design (removes the bigger space from battery element)
swap_color_grid_text: color of the alternate value inside the element of the net feed-in (default: #61687a)
swap_color_house_text: Color of the alternate value inside the element of the consumption (default: #00b5dd)
swap_color_production0_text: color of the alternate value inside the element of the solar production (default: #ffce4a)
swap_color_production1_text: color of the alternate value inside the element of the solar production (default: #ffce4a)
swap_color_production_text: color of the alternate value inside the element of the solar production (default: #ffce4a)
title_element_animation: Swap values and text inside the element
